crypto.name: Amineo
crypto.desc:
Author: GMO_Goat

In no world can you beat so much random!

crypto.name: Just Lattice
crypto.desc:
Author: yun

Is it even possible?

crypto.name: Modnar
crypto.desc:
Author: Warri

vsctf...idekctf...isitdtu... There's been sooooo many challenges involving Mersenne Twister lately this year...surely we must make one as well... Plus, I've cut out the middle man and am giving you the random.py source code directly!

crypto.name: Rolypoly
crypto.desc:
hard post-quantum

Author: Warri

after 2 years of waiting a warri post quantum chall is finally here
may or may not disappoint some friends in isogeny-thread, whatever and wherever that is

crypto.name: Simpler RSA
crypto.desc:
Author: yun

RSA is so complicated! I made it simpler.

crypto.name: Subathon
crypto.desc:
Author: Warri

Finally after so many man hours I'm done with my new totally not copied wholesale from some github repo cryptosystem!
...I don't have a use for it yet, but then I realised I can use it for a number guessing game! Now to make it into a subathon to get more subscriberzzz

crypto.name: Twister
crypto.desc:
Author: maximxls

I've developed this amazingly secure PRNG for my new game, BUG DESTROYER! There's a secret ending to the game, but it's practically unreachable. Maybe if you're lucky though...

crypto.name: epsilonDH
crypto.desc:
Author: GMO_Goat
ɛ-DH

DH was a bit boring so I spiced things up with my own custom algebra!

forensic.name: Black Meet Wukong
forensic.desc:
Author: Odin

Our system was attacked by a mysterious attacker. Could you help me recover the system and trace their footprint? (Flag has 2 parts!)
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SGOyMhxvupxYXJhCoRY2nxKi-5aEsydJ/view

forensic.name: Forgot Password
forensic.desc:
Author: Odin

I can't login now and to change the password I need security questions but I don't remember this guy. Can you help me recover them?
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SGOyMhxvupxYXJhCoRY2nxKi-5aEsydJ/view

forensic.name: Too Hidden
forensic.desc:
Author: Odin

I just found some suspicious traffic in my system.
Hmmmmmmmmmmm I hope that it is harmless…

*Flag is case insensitive, but follow the format wwf{fl46_f0rm47}

misc.name: All your base are belong to us
misc.desc:
Author: dfoo

Base 32? Sure.
Base 64? Yeah I know that one.
Base 2^16? ?????????


misc.name: Mutual TLS
misc.desc:
Author: spipm

Mutual TLS is best practice, so we created a PoC for an authentication service.
Can you check if this client certificate works at your side?

misc.name: Safe Unsafe
misc.desc:
Author: maximxls

I've unsafely read the flag, now you safely unsafely print it!

osint.name: Bulletproof
osint.desc:
easy geosint

Author: Havertz x vizer

A recent investigation revealed that a convenience store in your city has installed a unique, bullet-resistant transaction window.
This set-in-place barrier is not just a safety feature—it stands out as a symbol of security and modern design.

Your task is to identify this specific convenience store address.

Flag format: wwf{148hawthornest_chelsea_ma02150_usa}
*all lowercase

osint.name: Identity
osint.desc:
Author: vizer

Elowen Vaelith is widely known by his online alias, and very few people are aware of his real name. Can you use your OSINT skills to piece together the clues and uncover his true identity?

Flag format: wwf{lionel_andres_messi}
*all lowercase

osint.name: Memorial
osint.desc:
Author: vizer

What is Elowen Vaelith sister's favorite song name?

Flag format: wwf{die_with_a_smile}
*all lowercase

osint.name: To the sky
osint.desc:
Author: vizer

Description: Elowen Vaelith is a skilled software engineer, known for his sharp intellect and tech expertise. Recently, he shared an intriguing riddle on his social media. Based on the clues in his post, can you solve the riddle? It’s time to put your investigative skills to the test!

Flag format: wwf{dassault_mercure}
*all lowercase

pwn.name: Buffer Brawl
pwn.desc:
Author: V3in

Tonight... we are going to witness the most anticipated match in the history of CyberSec!
Step into the ring for the ultimate showdown against the stack!
Will you land the perfect punch or fall victim to a devastating counter?
In this high-stakes match, precision and timing are your best allies.
May the best hacker win!

pwn.name: CTF Registration
pwn.desc:
Author: nosiume

I'm finally making my own ctf competition!
I wanted to make sure that my registration system is safe and since I know from past ctf experience that glibc malloc is very easy to exploit; I decided to use a different allocator :)

pwn.name: Reverb
pwn.desc:
Author: Warri

HELLO
hello
ECHO
echo
GIMME FLAG
no you dont get flag

pwn.name: WhiteRabbit
pwn.desc:
Author: dfoo

Just a nice easy warmup for you...

rev.name: Flag Checker
rev.desc:
Author: 0xmikiko

Something was called before main. I don't know what it is, but it kinda deadly.

rev.name: Floats
rev.desc:
Author: Yannik

Zero minus zero equals zero. How can it ever be non-zero?

rev.name: Reminds Funny Stories 3
rev.desc:
medium mobile

Author: Qynklee

Can you drop 10 million hearts for Remind's funny stories to get flag?

web.name: Guessy CTF Solver
web.desc:
Author: AbdulHaq

Last month, during my vacation, I created a tool to solve guessy CTF challenges. I developed an automated application for this purpose, but currently, it can only solve easy challenges. The flag is located in /flag.txt. Can you solve this non-guessing challenge?

web.name: SAAS
web.desc:
Author: AbdulHaq

If we remove most of HTML tags then no xss right?

Welcome to Sanitization as a Service! We provide world-class HTML sanitization and even have a bug bounty program, but only L33T hackers can join. For this CTF, here is the source code of our demo application to showcase the power of our SANITIZER. If you are an authorized hacker, please report any findings to us.
